traits.label: Smokes (current)
traits.definition_notes: Current cigarette smoker using CDC recode (_RFSMOK3 if available). Fallback derives from SMOKE100 (ever smoked 100 cigarettes) and SMOKDAY2 (current frequency).

traits.label: Physically active (any leisure-time activity)
traits.definition_notes: Adults reporting any leisure-time physical activity. Uses _TOTINDA recode when present; otherwise derives from activity questions.

traits.label: High childcare time (≥ 60 min/day)
traits.definition_notes: Respondents with at least 60 minutes per day caring for/helping household children. Derived from activity summary columns (t0301* preferred, falling back to t03* if needed).
